subject: Soccer
Gold Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: In a contentious, foul-plagued match, it was fitting that the quarterfinal match between the U.S. and Panama was decided by a penalty kick at the end of the first overtime.
snippet: In a contentious, foul-plagued match, it was fitting that the quarterfinal match between the U.S. and Panama was decided by a penalty kick at the end of the first overtime.
